band.forms module

class band.forms.BandForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, instance=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)[source]

Bases: ModelForm

A form that is used to create and update Band objects in the database.

This form is a ModelForm, which means that it is automatically generated from the Band model. The Meta class defines the fields that are included in the form and specifies the widgets that are used to render the form fields in the HTML template.

Meta[source]

A class that defines metadata for the form, including the model that the form is based on, the fields that are included in the form, and the widgets that are used to render the form fields in the HTML template.

Type:

class

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

Metadata for the BandForm class.

The Meta class defines the model that the form is based on, the fields that are included in the form, and the widgets that are used to render the form fields in the HTML template.

model

The model that the form is based on.

Type:

class

fields

A list of fields that are included in the form.

Type:

list

widgets

A dictionary that maps field names to widget objects. Each widget object specifies how the corresponding form field should be rendered in the HTML template.

Type:

dict

fields = ['name', 'date_formed', 'genre', 'description', 'image']
model

alias of Band

widgets = {'date_formed': <django.forms.widgets.DateInput object>, 'description': <django.forms.widgets.Textarea object>, 'genre': <django.forms.widgets.TextInput object>, 'image': <django.forms.widgets.ClearableFileInput object>, 'name': <django.forms.widgets.TextInput object>}

CharField

date_formed

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

description

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

genre

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

get_next_by_date_formed(*, field=<django.db.models.fields.DateField: date_formed>, is_next=True, **kwargs)
get_previous_by_date_formed(*, field=<django.db.models.fields.DateField: date_formed>, is_next=False, **kwargs)
id

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

image

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

name

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>
user

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

user_id
class band.models.Migration(name, app_label)[source]

Bases: Migration

A class that represents a Django migration to set default ID values for bands created before auto-incrementing IDs were implemented.

dependencies

a list of migration dependencies.

Type:

list

operations

a list of migration operations.

Type:

list

dependencies = [('bands', '0001_initial')]
operations = [<RunPython <function set_default_id>>]
band.models.set_default_id(apps, schema_editor)[source]

A function to set default ID values for bands created before auto-incrementing IDs were implemented.

Parameters:

  • apps – a registry containing all installed apps.

  • schema_editor – a class used to manipulate database schemas.

Returns:

None.

band.tests module

band.urls module

The URLs for the bands app.

This module defines the URL patterns for the bands app. The URL patterns include views that are used to display home page, list of bands, login, registration, profile, adding and editing a band.

band.urls.app_name

The name of the Django app.

Type:

str

band.urls.urlpatterns

The list of URL patterns for the bands app.

Type:

list
